attributes.description:
2011 BMW E90 320i ENGINE VERY CLEAN NICE SEAT Mileage: 129000 km. Color: Silver Price: R94, 995 Neg


BLACKLISTED ARE ALSO WELCOME TO APPLY FOR FINANCE


Features: LEATHER NICE SEAT INTERIOR As Good As New Car, 3x3 Point Rear Seat Belts, Driver airbag and Passenger airbag, Adjustable Seats, With Spare Tire, Wheel, 18’’ inch Meg’s, Smash & grab, Anti theft system, ABS, Airbags, Air condition, Spotless, Nice In Color Low Mileage On Clock, Central Locking, and Gear Locking, New Tires, Alloy Wheel's, Spotlights In Front, Alarm and Mobilize Power Steering, and Adjustable steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Aircon, Factory fitted Louder Mp3 Radio, Car Very Clean Inside And Outside, with Average Fuel of 7.1 liter per 100km. Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition. This car is still very clean and has a Road worthy certificate. 


Definitely A Must See Please Call/WhatsApp DE REV AUTOS to View All Vehicle.

1. We stock a wide variety of quality, used, low kilometer vehicles such as sedans, hatchbacks, SUVs and bakkies 
2. All our second hand vehicles for sale undergo a stringent 116-point quality assurance check 
3. Over 1,000 popular makes and models of used cars available 
4. Finance and Insurance arranged on the spot
5. Finance available with all banks Neat and Immaculate Condition.
 
Going for both CASH / FINANCE! If you would like to come view or tests drive the vehicle, we are situated at 658 LOUIS BOTHA AVEUNE WYNBERG SANDTON JOHANNESBURG 2090. Operating hours are from 08:00 till 17:00 Mon - Fri and 08:00 till 14:00 Sat. ALTERNATIVE CONTACT: CALL 011 485 1186 OR WHATS APP 0784890344, 0810023905

attributes.description: Excellent Condition, low mileage ! BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of the vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our valued customers,part of a 60-year legacy, this fully-fledged automotive dealer group offers New Cars, Used Cars, Parts, and services to all existing and potential customers. With us, you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now.
